Package starwars.userinterfaces

Class TextInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • starwars.userinterfaces.TextInterface
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MapRenderer, MessageRenderer, SimulationController

    public class TextInterface
extends java.lang.Object
implements MessageRenderer, MapRenderer, SimulationController
    IMPORTANT This UI is no longer required and is not compatible with the controller. Needs to be deleted! - Asel

    • Constructor Detail

      • TextInterface

        public TextInterface​(SWWorld world)
        Constructor for the Text Interface

        This text interface can be used to display messages, grid and obtain user input in the Text Console

        Parameters:
        world - The world being considered by the Text Interface

    • Method Detail

      • showBanner

        public static void showBanner​()
        Display the simulation banner. Based on code from the original Eiffel version of this program, and originally generated by the UNIX program figlet.

        Parameters:
        message - the String to display

      • drawGrid

        private void drawGrid​()
        Displays the Hobbit Grid using a System.out.println()

        This method prints the entire Hobbit Grid as a text output. Each location will be separated out with vertical seperators '|' and will contain the symbols of the locations contents

      • getUserDecision

        public static SWActionInterface getUserDecision​(SWActor a)
        Display a menu and receive user input.
        Parameters:
        a - the SWActor to display options for
        Returns:
        the SWActionInterface that the player has chosen to perform.
